item.description:
*** Weather outlook: Sunny, 67F - 70F, and 0% chance rain!!! -for a change ;-) ***

A 3 to 4 mile hike at Penwood State Park, with a couple of options for the route to make a loop. Some elevation gain, but nothing too difficult. Some views at Lake Louise on the ridge and an open spot a bit further on looking west. Might catch a near sunset view. Plan to meet in the parking lot at Penwood.

Pets on a leash are permitted on hiking trails.


Approximate location/directions (drive into park to parking lot on right):
http://www.mapquest.c...
[Lat.=41.83827, Long.=-72.78627]

Trail map:
http://www.ct.gov/dep...

For more information on Penwood Park:
http://www.ct.gov/dep...


=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.

item.name: Hike at Penwood SP in Bloomfield CT
